name: Dummy Dungeon
description:
Dummy Dungeon, despite its colorful setting, offers fast-paced gameplay in the first-person view, requiring the player's mechanical skills and focus. In addition, the player has a lot of freedom in creating his unique style while traversing through the dungeons.

Various locations:
Explore different corners of the world, from dark dungeons to huge flying machines filled with unique enemies and tons of items to collect.

Unique characters:
Choose one of the 22 playable characters, each of whom has unique abilities that change the rules of the game.

Powerful buffs and improvements
Modify your statistics and weapons while playing; adapt your equipment to your own vision of how you want to save a beautiful princess.

A large arsenal of unique weapons:
Over 50 weapons with a lot of modifiers and buffs, each of which offers a slightly different fighting style.

Challenging fights and interesting bosses:
Each floor ends with a fight with a powerful opponent with a wide range of attacks and abilities, thanks to which the fights are very dynamic and interesting.
